title: Two dead in Killeen apartment shooting; police looking for accused shooter
content:
At least two people are dead and three wounded after an early-morning shooting at a North Killeen apartment complex.
A Killeen Police Department spokeswoman said that five people were shot at the Village West Apartments in the 400 block of Gilmer Street. Police responded to a report of shots fired about 3:20 a.m. and found five victims.
Justice of the Peace Bill Cooke confirmed that he pronounced two females dead at the apartments just after 4 a.m. Tuesday.
Cooke said he will order an autopsy on both women.
Police said the remaining three victims were transported to two area hospitals, and their condition was unknown.
Police had no information on the suspected shooter.
